title: Validate against published nonlinear benchmarks
description: Add benchmark cases from literature (plastic necking, large-deformation patch tests) with acceptance tolerances and automated regression checks.

title: Build nonlinear FEM solver on Metal
description: Create a clean-slate Swift + Metal finite element solver optimized for small models with nonlinear geometry, J2/von-Mises plasticity with ductility damage, and enforced displacement boundary conditions. Include a runnable example and tests.

title: Add visualization pipeline for stress/deformation/BCs
description: Export stepwise FEM results for stress and exaggerated deformation with enforced displacement overlays; include gradual load progression output.

title: Offload tangent assembly to Metal
description: Current Newton loop uses CPU element linearization for local tangents. Add a Metal path for tangent/Jacobian contributions to keep full solve path GPU-accelerated on larger meshes.

title: Add consistent tangent and sparse global solver
description: Replace finite-difference Jacobian + dense solve with a consistent material/geometric tangent and sparse solve path to improve scalability while preserving robustness for small models.
